actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, GSA, ACIR.
Referred to Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of real property taxes, with respect to certain real property owned by the Federal Government.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of General Services to pay to State and local governments amounts equivalent to the property taxes that would be generated by federally owned land if such land were privately owned, provided that the federally owned land comprises at least three percent of the land area of the local government. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of real property taxes, with respect to certain real property owned by the Federal Government.
